item.title: Solarsystem 2
item.description: This time we will only use the scene graph to render our solarsystem and add some details: we add the moon and let it orbit around the earth and on top of orbiting we add rotation around their own axis to all the planets. Add the moon: T3DMesh<float> M; //StaticActor m_Moon SAssetIO::load("Assets/ExampleScenes/Solar/moon/scene.gltf", &M); setMeshShader(&M, 0.4f, 0.02f); M.computePerVertexNormals(); m_Moon.init(&M); M.clear(); Now to the changed scene graph: we will add Transformation Nodes for every planet.
